messages.content: What does the Transform Template onto Face Mask node do?

The Transform Template onto Face Mask node takes a template and a face mask as inputs, and transforms the template to fit over the face by calculating the centroid and eigenvectors of the Face. It's useful for placing things onto a face and assumes only one shape in the face mask with white pixels over a black background.
How do I install the ComfyUI Discopixel nodes?

To install the ComfyUI Discopixel nodes, clone the repo into your ComfyUI extensions directory using 'git clone https://github.com/discopixel-studio/comfyui-discopixel'. Then, install the dependencies using your preferred method with 'pip3 install -r requirements.txt', and finally restart ComfyUI.
